definition.name: NXxrot

symbols.doc: The symbol(s) listed here will be used below to coordinate datasets with the same shape.

definition.doc:
raw data from a rotation camera, extends :ref:`NXxbase`
This is the application definition for raw data from a rotation camera. It extends :ref:`NXxbase`, so the full definition is the content of :ref:`NXxbase` plus the data defined here.

field.name: definition
field.doc: Official NeXus NXDL schema to which this file conforms.

field.name: polar_angle
field.doc: The polar_angle (two theta) where the detector is placed.

field.name: beam_center_x
field.doc: This is the x position where the direct beam would hit the detector. This is a length, not a pixel position, and can be outside of the actual detector.

field.name: beam_center_y
field.doc: This is the y position where the direct beam would hit the detector. This is a length, not a pixel position, and can be outside of the actual detector.

field.name: rotation_angle
field.doc: This is an array holding the sample rotation start angle at each scan point

field.name: rotation_angle_step
field.doc: This is an array holding the step made for sample rotation angle at each scan point
